title: 1st Shuttle Force Smash Cup
description: What a better way to start the year?
Kick off 2026 with power, passion, and a whole lot of smashing action!
Introducing Shuttle Force - Powered by Goodminton Smash Zone, our very first Shuttle Smash Cup happening on January 18, 2026 at Goodminton Smash Zone, Pasig City!
Whether you're leveling up your game, testing your skills, or simply ready to have fun with the community, this tournament is the perfect way to spark your competitive spirit this new year.

‚ú® CATEGORIES (Non-Gender Doubles): 
‚Ä¢ Level B - Advanced 
‚Ä¢ Level C - High Intermediate 
‚Ä¢ Level D - Low Intermediate 
‚Ä¢ Level E - High Beginner

üí∞ Cash Prizes for Champions: 
‚Ä¢ Level B - ‚Ç±5,000 
‚Ä¢ Level C - ‚Ç±4,000 
‚Ä¢ Level D - ‚Ç±3,000 
‚Ä¢ Level E - ‚Ç±2,000
Plus ‚Ç±1,000 for 1st runner-up and medals for all awardees!

üéΩ Tournament Inclusions: 
Jersey, awards, cash prizes, shuttlecock, and court fee.

üí∏ Entry Fee: ‚Ç±1100 
Second entry: ‚Ç±800

üìå IMPORTANT REMINDER: 
Participants should have at least played at Goodminton Smash Zone. If you're unsure of your level, message us and we'll assist you.
üìÜ Deadline of Registration: January 7, 2026
This is your moment to serve strong, smash harder, and start the year with energy that sets the tone for 2026. Don't miss it!
For inquiries, message the Goodminton Smash Zone FB page or contact 0917 512 1809.
Let's bring the FORCE to the court!
#ShuttleForce #GoodmintonSmashZone #StartTheYearStrong #BadmintonPH #maketimeforgoodthings #PasigBadminton
